Petitioners have also sought a writ of Mandamus directing the 1st Respondent and/or the Pirivena

writ  of  Mandamus  has  been  sought  to  direct  the  1st  Respondent  to  take  steps  to  allow  the  1st
Petitioner  to  work  as  a  pirivena  teacher  and  to  pay  his  salary,  to  provide  books  and  uniforms  to
